From November 2018 to January 2019, Malte H체ckst채dt worked at the Research Data Centre of the *German Centre for Science and Higher Education Research* (DZHW) on the preparation of qualitative data for the creation of an SUF. Since February 2019, he has been working in the *Governance in Science and Higher Education* department in the project *Determinants and Effects of Collaboration in Research Collaborations* ([DEKiF](https://dekif-survey.dzhw.eu/en/index_html)).
